column5: Hey folks, Just wondering if anyone who is coming from west of Quinte could tell me the best way to get to Perfect Vue. I know where it is, but I am wondering if I should take the 401 all the way to Napanee or should I take my usual route through Prince Edward County, to Picton, then the Glenora Ferry? Thanks folks! HH
I would go the Napanee route...it's a lot quicker...exit 579 off the 401
I get off at Marysville RD and stop at the Indian store for tax free stuff then turn left at the lights into Napanee.

You c ould make a stop at the Mohawk Territory and acquire smokes(cigars) and gas, (gas was 82.4 in Kingston today) and get back to Hwy 41 south (Centre St)  Cross the bridge (past the Pioneer), turn right at the lights and follow the River Road to Perfect Vue.  Lotsa Luck on the weekend, could be cool and windy
Oh my God Dave whats this for once our gas is the same price I paid 83.99almost) here in Quebec tonight I hope its cheaper in the morning I am filling up the boat in Ontario
Fill up in Brockville on the way by... was 77.9 @ the ultramar (2 lights north of the 401) this morning.
Thanks for the directions, I am PUMPED for this trip, hope to arrive just before dark!
Good luck guys and lookin' forward to the report!!...I'll definately jump in on the bandwagon next year!!
